A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If expanding the Star Wars Universe was the goal\, then The Last Jedi succeeded with aplomb.  I was disappointed in what I thought was going to happen\, and confused in other spots\, but that's a good\, not a bad thing.  A very fun movie that is going to tick off a lot of fanboys and their \"only male Jedi's have latitude to do that new Force type stuff!\" attitudes.
